components.name: AND gate
components.description: Outputs a TRUE value only if both its inputs are TRUE.

components.name: OR gate
components.description: Outputs a TRUE value if either of its inputs are TRUE.

components.name: NOT gate
components.description: Outputs the opposite value of its input.

components.name: XOR gate
components.description: Outputs a TRUE value if and only if exactly one of its inputs are TRUE.

components.name: Output light
components.description: Lights up if its input is TRUE.

components.name: Edge splitter
components.description: Splits a connector into two, preserving its value.

components.name: Switch
components.description: Generates a TRUE or FALSE value depending on the state of the switch. Click to toggle.

components.name: Clock input
components.description: Generates a value which changes between TRUE and FALSE in a cycle. Click to configure cycle duration.

components.name: Identifiable Switch
components.description: Like a Switchable input but has an identifier for challenge purposes

components.name: Identifiable Output
components.description: Like an Output but has an identifier for challenge purposes
